topic.title: Non-Human Laboratory Test Result - conformance rules

section.p: Information on laboratory data collected on a reporting form or received from a central provider or vendor.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
A coded value that identifies the laboratory test result. The verbatim text is placed within the original text property of the CD data type. [SDTM: LBTESTCD, LBTEST. LBLOINC] If the LOINC code is available it should be used as the base code within the CD type.

SHALL contain [1..2] id
A value that is provided to ensure the uniqueness of the laboratory result. [SDTM: LBSEQ, LBSPID] A single identifier, the sequence number, is required.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode
Used to indicate whether or not an exam has been performed. [SDTM: LBSTAT]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] value with data type CD
The laboratory result, using both original units and a standard format or set of units. [SDTM: LBORRES, LBORRESU, LBSTRESC, LBSTRESN, LBSTRESU]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Allows capture of a group identifier for the laboratory result.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Group Identifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.63)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode
Indicates the method of the test or examination. [SDTM: LBMETHOD]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Used to capture information about the specimen used as the direct subject of the test.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Specimen Information (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.67)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a category the laboratory test result is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] laboratoryTestResultCategory with data type laboratory Test Result Category

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a subcategory the laboratory test result is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] laboratoryTestResultSubCategory with data type laboratory Test Result Sub Category

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] referenceRange
Information regarding the reference range - normal high and/or low values - associated with the test being performed.
This referenceRange SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="REFV"
This referenceRange SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observationRange
This observationRange SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
This observationRange SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN.CRT" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observationRange SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus)
This observationRange SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] interpretationCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.83 ObservationInterpretation)
The value is used to interpret the meaning of the range information.
This observationRange SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQR
Contains the actual reference range value as an interval of physical quantities. Note, the predetermined value of interpretation code indicates that the normal range is being reported. [SDTM: LBORNRLO, LBORNHRHI, LBSTTNLO, LBSTNRLO, LBSTRNHI, LBSTNRC, LBNRIND] Standard referemce ramge values go into the base value and unt, while the orginal values use the translation property of the PQR type.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Captures the reason for not performing the indicated test.
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.64)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] study Test Performer
Used to capture the organization performing the test.
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Test Performer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.73)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Used to indicate whether or not a result is considered a baseline value for the study.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Baseline Indicator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.56)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Derived Data Indicator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.60)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Used to indicate whether or not the study subject was fasting at the time of specimen collection.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus)
The code value indicates the observation concerns the subject's fasting status.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BN
Information on whether the person was fasting at the time the specimen was collected. [SDTM: LBFAST]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Captures toxicity information associated with the laobratory test.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship Contains zero or one [0..1] LabtoxicityGrade with data type lab Toxicity Grade
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHALL contain [1..2] id
A value that is provided to ensure the uniqueness of the laboratory result. [SDTM: LBSEQ, LBSPID] A single identifier, the sequence number, is required.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
A coded value that identifies the laboratory test result. The verbatim text is placed within the original text property of the CD data type. [SDTM: LBTESTCD, LBTEST. LBLOINC] If the LOINC code is available it should be used as the base code within the CD type.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode
Used to indicate whether or not an exam has been performed. [SDTM: LBSTAT]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] value with data type CD
The laboratory result, using both original units and a standard format or set of units. [SDTM: LBORRES, LBORRESU, LBSTRESC, LBSTRESN, LBSTRESU]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode
Indicates the method of the test or examination. [SDTM: LBMETHOD]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Group Identifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.63)
Allows capture of a group identifier for the laboratory result.

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Specimen Information (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.67)
Used to capture information about the specimen used as the direct subject of the test.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a category the laboratory test result is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] laboratoryTestResultCategory with data type laboratory Test Result Category

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a subcategory the laboratory test result is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] laboratoryTestResultSubCategory with data type laboratory Test Result Sub Category

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] referenceRange
Information regarding the reference range - normal high and/or low values - associated with the test being performed.
This referenceRange SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="REFV"
This referenceRange SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observationRange
This observationRange SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
This observationRange SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN.CRT" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observationRange SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus)
This observationRange SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] interpretationCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.83 ObservationInterpretation)
The value is used to interpret the meaning of the range information.
This observationRange SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQR
Contains the actual reference range value as an interval of physical quantities. Note, the predetermined value of interpretation code indicates that the normal range is being reported. [SDTM: LBORNRLO, LBORNHRHI, LBSTTNLO, LBSTNRLO, LBSTRNHI, LBSTNRC, LBNRIND] Standard referemce ramge values go into the base value and unt, while the orginal values use the translation property of the PQR type.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.64)
Captures the reason for not performing the indicated test.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] study Test Performer
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Test Performer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.73)
Used to capture the organization performing the test.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Baseline Indicator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.56)
Used to indicate whether or not a result is considered a baseline value for the study.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Derived Data Indicator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.60)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Used to indicate whether or not the study subject was fasting at the time of specimen collection.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus)
The code value indicates the observation concerns the subject's fasting status.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BN
Information on whether the person was fasting at the time the specimen was collected. [SDTM: LBFAST]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Captures toxicity information associated with the laobratory test.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship Contains zero or one [0..1] LabtoxicityGrade with data type lab Toxicity Grade
